title: Nope, I'm still not cool ☹️ - Jlab JBuds Frames
description: Sign up for a free account and get 20% off Grammarly Premium at   Sunglasses are great to keep the sun out of your eyes, but... well, they do make you look kind of a douche. Use the JBuds if you want to up that factor a wee bit. And yes, he had them on the wrong way for a bit, but he fixed it.
